calculate_kinetic_energy(iso)[source]

Calls a specific function for the calculation of the kinetic energy depending on the solver method

Parameters

iso (int) – Isotopologue number

Raises

ValueError: – If the name of the solver method is not correct, an error occurrs

Returns

T – The calculated matrix of the kinetic energy

Return type

numpy.ndarray
